name: Chronicles of Vipers
description:
Chronicles of Vipers is a remake-demake first-person shooter inspired by old 8-bit and 16-bit console games, as well as VHS-era movies.
You play as a secret CIA agent, Steven "The Viper" Rogers. Your task is to free all your colleagues from captivity in different parts of Colombia, as well as to destroy a new threat - the "Free Drug Seekers" cartel.
The game includes "old school mechanics":
- Only two types of weapons;
- Several types of enemies;
- 6 different locations inspired by VHS era movies;
- Simple plot;
- Dynamic gameplay;
- Stylized graphics for the zero era.
Help agent "Viper" in the case of liberating friends and eliminating a drug den in the territory of Colombia. For this, you have a pistol and a machine gun, as well as the ability to open any door. So - act!
